cast.overview: A successful lawyer returns to his hometown for his mother's funeral only to discover that his estranged father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder.
cast.title: The Judge

crew.overview: World War II soldier-turned-U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a patient from a hospital for the criminally insane, but his efforts are compromised by troubling visions and a mysterious doctor.
crew.title: Shutter Island

details.biography: Susan has been a model in various publications, articles, and advertisements in magazines and television since the age of 23 with a wide portfolio. A background in dance as well has given her experience in community theatre and musicals. Most recently in films and television in the capacity of an actress she has begun to expand her career to include more interesting and noticeable work. She just became Affiliated with New England Film studios located in Ayer Massachusetts.
details.name: Susan Garfield
